title: H & H Lawyers Intranet
subTitle: This is a subtitle
description: I developed a comprehensive intranet for H & H Lawyers, designed to enhance internal communication and collaboration among team members. This platform serves as a central hub for accessing essential resources, including company policies, forms, and training materials. By implementing user-friendly features and intuitive navigation, I ensured that employees can easily find the information they need to perform their jobs efficiently. Additionally, the intranet facilitates real-time updates and announcements, fostering a more connected and informed workplace culture within the firm.

skills: Programming: Java, Thymeleaf, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, jQuery, Bootstrap, MySQL
Cloud Services: AWS Elastic Beanstalk, AWS Load Balancer, Route 53, Azure Entra ID
Other: Agile Methodology, SOLID principles, MVC pattern
jd: Verified third-party APIs, including MS Exchange API, to get authorisation by OAuth 2.0.
Developed the intranet and deployed it to AWS.
Ensured Web Standard Validation in alignment with W3C Web Standards.
Conducted unit testing and integration testing.
Wrote technical documentation and end-user manuals.
